mapper.insert: insert into article( title, summary, content, author, weight, copy_from, cover, `read`, username, publish_time) values (#{title},#{summary},#{content},#{author},#{weight},#{copyFrom},#{cover},#{read},#{username},#{publishTime})
mapper.select: SELECT title, summary, comment, publish_time FROM article where title=#{title}
SELECT id, title, summary, content, comment, author, state, weight, copy_from, cover, `read`, username FROM article where upload_state=0 and state =3
mapper.update: update article set upload_state=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, state, weight, `read`, username, create_time AS createTime FROM article where id in ( SELECT article.id FROM article WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM tags WHERE tags.tag_id in (${tags}) and NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM article_tag WHERE article_tag.article_id = article.id AND article_tag.tag_id = tags.tag_id ) ) )and state < 3 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, title, state, weight, `read`, username, create_time AS createTime FROM article where state < 3 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, title, state, weight, `read`, username, create_time AS createTime FROM article ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT title, summary, content, comment, author, state, weight, copy_from AS copyFrom, cover, `read`, username FROM article WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT t.id AS id, t.title AS title FROM (SELECT article.id AS id, article.title AS title, article.create_time AS create_time, article.state AS state FROM catalog_tag AS cat RIGHT JOIN article_tag AS art ON cat.tag_id = art.tag_id RIGHT JOIN article ON art.article_id = article.id WHERE cat.catalog_id = #{catalogId} GROUP BY art.article_id) AS t WHERE t.state > 1 ORDER BY t.state DESC, t.create_time DESC
